snippet.title: BIG HELMET HEROES - Release window trailer
snippet.description:
The hilarious beat’em up Big Helmet Heroes is coming on PC, Xbox Series, Nintendo Switch and PS5 🎉 EARLY 2025 🎉 Discover the 4 play styles and find your favorite way to fight! 🛡️⚔️🧘🔨 Play the demo on Steam or Xbox and try them all! https://bighelmetheroesgame.com

⚔️ What is Big Helmet Heroes?
Throw yourself into an epic 3D beat’em up adventure with adorable knights, full of surprising worlds and situations. Grab your buddy and play in 2 player co-op to save the princess, but this is only the beginning!

Follow us:
🧡 Twitter: https://twitter.com/ExaltedStudio
💜 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/hksncHXXa9

#beatemup
